channel.title: Adding bankers and npc with custom drops and removing npc
channel.description:
okay i want to add two things ima number them and if you got the answer and want to help respond and put the number your answering it would help ty.
1. i want too had 2 bank booths at home and bank i got cords how do i add them.
2. i want to add about 10 npcs (hyde) that drop vesta/stat/zureils/morrigans with 2% drop rate how do i do this.
3.i need to remove a npc but i cant find it in the files how do i remove it.
